item.title: market watch 2026
item.description:
Theodosius Dobzhansky: Nothing in biology makes sense except in the light of evolution.

2026-01-21: Gold $4850

  • Gold down to $4650 from $47K, then jumped over $4850.

  • Bitcoin down to 88K~89K.

  • Netflix afterhour down 5%, now about -7% to $81 after earning with lower guidance and uncertainty of Warner Brother deal. After opening, it stayed around $85.

  • Now Treasury yields rose to their highest level in four months. “sell America” triggerred by tariffs over Greenland.
